story: #G24# As a data reuser, I want to view a DOI for a dataset, so that I can get back to the data in future and I can import the dataset into my referencemanagement software automatically.

extraction.benefit: I can get back to the data in future and I can import the dataset into my referencemanagement software automatically.

categories.benefit: I can get back to the data in future and I can import the dataset into my referencemanagement software automatically.
